tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I\'ve taken two classes with Professor Sullivan and have been happy each time. She is always there for me when I ask for advice on job hunting, writing letters, and ways to better succeed at the university overall. She is an excellent person to have on your side too. I really enjoy her classes, especially Writing on the Job.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Professor Sullivan could be A English teacher. She thought in middle and high school (trade school) but i don\'t think she is suited for a University level. She is teaching Oral Communication course but we couldn\'t barely hear what she is saying unless you sit in the front row. Not easy to follow and assumes you understand everything.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Took short story during spring 2013. Rating now because why not. It was a good elective for a business major. Very easy class & I actually enjoyed some of the stories. Had to read 1-3 stories a week, and pass in 2 paragraph response for each one. Two 2page papers, midterm and a final. Easy, enjoyable and good teacher. For an elective? u wont regret

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Professor Sullivan is a good teacher. She is clear,articulate and she is brilliant with classic communication (i.e., verbal and written communication). Her only flaw is that she lacks knowledge of current technology and social media which is essential in business communication.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is ok.I\'ve taken 2 classes with her.She does teach you a lot.However, if she doesn\'t like you,you will never get a grade higher than a B.I submitted a paper in her class that I had used in another class,with the other professors permission,just to prove my point.She gave me a B- while the other teacher said is was an A quality paper.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Prof. Sullivan is a great professor! She is very helpful and clearly states learning objectives. If you fail in her class you can only blame yourself. Deadlines and assignments were fair and not too difficult.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Oral communications should be a mandatory class. Rita is great, friendly, helpful, patient and kind. Class will help u in ANY degree! Helps build confidence in public speeking and everyday. Small class focuses on each and every student. Pays well attention to your well being.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Professor Sullivan is a great teacher. I took her oral communications class and it was well worth the tutition money. You give three presentations, one being your final. She prepares you for them and cares about you succeeding in her class. Highly recommended!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: she was very nice and helpful and you could redo all your papers for better grades. however class felt like a high school class with pre editing after each paper and in class group readings. you had to do work for this class.
